text: Sar Shamir Road railway station () is a station on Sar Shamir road, Faisalabad district of Punjab, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Faisalabad District Category:Railway stations on Khanewal–Wazirabad Line
title: Sar Shamir Road railway station
